long_description: The Nathan Reflective Runner's belt increases your visibility when enjoying a low-light run on the road. High-visibility ANSI yellow mesh material and Scotchlite(TM) reflective strips offers 360deg reflectivity. Zippered pocket is perfect for stashing your ID, keys, phone, gel packets or other small essentials. Side-release buckle for easy on and off. The Nathan Reflective Runner's belt includes a waterproof ID/medical card.
short_description: The Nathan Reflective Runner's belt increases your visibility when enjoying a low-light run on the road.
